trans-unit.source: When fallback, reverts the connection to normal FastL4 load-balancing, based on the client's TCP header. This causes the BIG-IP system to choose a back-end server based only on the source address and port.

trans-unit.source: When fallback, the normal FastL4 load balancing methods are acceptable to pick a server.

trans-unit.source: When indefinite, disables the limit. This allows the client unlimited time to send the sender and target information.

trans-unit.source: When indefinite, specifies UDP connections can remain idle indefinitely.

trans-unit.source: When indefinite, specifies that attempting a TCP handshake never times out.

trans-unit.source: When installed, ensures that the UCS is uploaded and installed, on the system. When present, ensures that the UCS is uploaded. When absent, the UCS will be removed from the system. trans-unit.source: When policy_type is parent, the policy becomes a parent to which other Security policies attach, inheriting its attributes. This policy type cannot be applied to Virtual Servers.

trans-unit.source: When poll is 0, Ansible will start the task and immediately move on to the next one without waiting for a result.

trans-unit.source: When poll is a positive value, the playbook will still block on the task until it either completes, fails or times out.
trans-unit.target: 当 poll 为正值时，剧本仍会阻塞任务，直到任务完成，失败或超时。

trans-unit.target: 当 state=absent 时，master和logging将设置为False，并且层也将被删除

trans-unit.source: When state=default, supported params will be reset to a default state. These include dr_prio, hello_auth_key, hello_interval, jp_policy_out, jp_policy_in, jp_type_in, jp_type_out, border, neighbor_policy, neighbor_type.

trans-unit.source: When state=default, supported params will be reset to a default state. These include version, startup_query_interval, startup_query_count, robustness, querier_timeout, query_mrt, query_interval, last_member_qrt, last_member_query_count, group_timeout, report_llg, and immediate_leave.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=default 时，支持的参数将重置为默认状态。这些措施包括 version ， startup_query_interval ， startup_query_count ， robustness ， querier_timeout ， query_mrt ， query_interval ， last_member_qrt ， last_member_query_count ， group_timeout ， report_llg 和 immediate_leave 。

trans-unit.target: 当 state=present 时，未设置 product_id 且路径为URL，此文件将始终下载到临时目录中以进行幂等检查，否则仅在未基于 product_id 检查安装软件包的情况下才下载该文件。

trans-unit.target: 当 state=present 时，如果权限不存在，则会添加该权限。

trans-unit.source: When state=unconfigured, the interface will result with having a default Layer 2 interface, i.e. vlan 1 in access mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=unconfigured 时，该接口将具有默认的第2层接口，即处于访问模式的vlan 1。

trans-unit.source: When stateless, specifies a virtual server that accepts traffic matching the virtual server address and load balances the packet to the pool members without attempting to match the packet to a pre-existing connection in the connection table. New connections are immediately removed from the connection table. This addresses the requirement for one-way UDP traffic that needs to be processed at very high throughput levels, for example, load balancing syslog traffic to a pool of syslog servers. Stateless virtual servers are not suitable for processing traffic requiring stateful tracking, such as TCP traffic. Stateless virtual servers do not support iRules, persistence, connection mirroring, rateshaping, or SNAT automap.
trans-unit.target: 当 stateless ，指定接受流量匹配虚拟服务器地址和负载平衡的数据包发送到池成员而不尝试分组匹配在连接表中预先存在的连接的虚拟服务器。新连接将立即从连接表中删除。这解决了对单向UDP流量的需求，该流量需要以非常高的吞吐量级别进行处理，例如，将syslog流量负载均衡到syslog服务器池。无状态虚拟服务器不适用于处理需要状态跟踪的流量，例如TCP流量。无状态虚拟服务器不支持iRules，持久性，连接镜像，速率调整或SNAT自动映射。

trans-unit.source: When stateless, specifies a virtual server that accepts traffic matching the virtual server address and load balances the packet to the pool members without attempting to match the packet to a pre-existing connection in the connection table. New connections are immediately removed from the connection table. This addresses the requirement for one-way UDP traffic that needs to be processed at very high throughput levels, for example, load balancing syslog traffic to a pool of syslog servers. Stateless virtual servers are not suitable for processing traffic that requires stateful tracking, such as TCP traffic. Stateless virtual servers do not support iRules, persistence, connection mirroring, rateshaping, or SNAT automap.
trans-unit.target: 当 stateless ，指定接受流量匹配虚拟服务器地址和负载平衡的数据包发送到池成员而不尝试分组匹配在连接表中预先存在的连接的虚拟服务器。新连接将立即从连接表中删除。这解决了对单向UDP流量的需求，该流量需要以非常高的吞吐量级别进行处理，例如，将syslog流量负载均衡到syslog服务器池。无状态虚拟服务器不适用于处理需要状态跟踪的流量，例如TCP流量。无状态虚拟服务器不支持iRules，持久性，连接镜像，速率调整或SNAT自动映射。

trans-unit.source: When stderr is returned we also always provide this field which is a list of strings, one item per line from the original.
trans-unit.target: 当 stderr 返回，我们也一直提供这一领域是一个字符串列表，每行一个项目从原来的。

trans-unit.source: When stdout is returned, Ansible always provides a list of strings, each containing one item per line from the original output.
trans-unit.target: 当 stdout 被返回，Ansible总是提供字符串的列表，每行各含一个项目从原始输出。

trans-unit.source: When strict, the TCP connection limit is honored with no exceptions. This means idle connections will prevent new TCP connections from being made until they expire, even if they could otherwise be reused.
trans-unit.target: 当 strict 的TCP连接数限制很荣幸，没有例外。这意味着空闲连接将阻止建立新的TCP连接，直到它们失效为止，即使它们可以重新使用也是如此。

trans-unit.source: When strict, the TCP connection limit is honored with no exceptions. This means that idle connections will prevent new TCP connections from being made until they expire, even if they could otherwise be reused.
trans-unit.target: 当 strict 的TCP连接数限制很荣幸，没有例外。这意味着空闲连接将阻止建立新的TCP连接，直到它们失效为止，即使它们可以重新使用也是如此。

trans-unit.source: When subscribe, configures the "SIP SUBSCRIBE Method" SIP Protocol Security vector.
trans-unit.target: 当 subscribe ，配置“SIP订阅方法” SIP协议安全性载体。

trans-unit.source: When sum-members, specifies that the system adds together the scores of the pool members associated with the monitor's target virtual servers and uses that value in the load balancing operation.
trans-unit.target: 当 sum-members 时，指定系统将与监视器的目标虚拟服务器关联的池成员的分数加在一起，并在负载平衡操作中使用该值。

trans-unit.source: When sum-members, specifies the system adds together the scores of the pool members associated with the monitor's target virtual servers and uses that value in the load balancing operation.

trans-unit.source: When sum-nodes, specifies the system adds together the scores of the nodes associated with the monitor's target virtual servers and uses that value in the load balancing operation.

trans-unit.source: When system_mode_maintenance=true it puts all enabled protocols in maintenance mode (using the isolate command). When system_mode_maintenance=false it puts all enabled protocols in normal mode (using the no isolate command).
trans-unit.target: 当 system_mode_maintenance=true 时，它将所有启用的协议置于维护模式（使用isolate命令）。当 system_mode_maintenance=false 时，它将所有启用的协议置于普通模式（使用noisolate命令）。

trans-unit.source: When system_mode_maintenance_dont_generate_profile=true it prevents the dynamic searching of enabled protocols and executes commands configured in a maintenance-mode profile. Use this option if you want the system to use a maintenance-mode profile that you have created. When system_mode_maintenance_dont_generate_profile=false it prevents the dynamic searching of enabled protocols and executes commands configured in a normal-mode profile. Use this option if you want the system to use a normal-mode profile that you have created.
trans-unit.target: 当 system_mode_maintenance_dont_generate_profile=true 时,它将阻止动态搜索已启用的协议，并执行在维护模式配置文件中配置的命令。如果您希望系统使用您创建的维护模式配置文件，请使用此选项。当 system_mode_maintenance_dont_generate_profile=false 时,它将阻止动态搜索已启用的协议，并执行在普通模式配置文件中配置的命令。如果希望系统使用已创建的普通模式配置文件，请使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: When tx-rx, the interface honors pause frames from its partner, and also generates pause frames when necessary.

trans-unit.source: When yes will always result in a change when executing the module.

trans-unit.source: When yes, increases the congestion window by basing the amount to increase on the number of previously unacknowledged bytes that each ACK covers.

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies all persistent connections from a client IP address that go to the same virtual IP address also go to the same node.

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies all persistent connections from the same client IP address go to the same node.

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies if the active unit goes into the standby mode, the system mirrors any persistence records to its peer.

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that all persistent connections from the same client IP address go to the same node.

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that connections in a TIME-WAIT state are reused when the system receives a SYN packet, indicating a request for a new connection.

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the internal DNS resolver randomizes character case in domain name queries issued to the root DNS servers.

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the monitor ignores down responses for the duration of the monitor timeout. Once the monitor timeout is reached without the system receiving an up response, the system marks the object down.

trans-unit.source: When restart is set to true, the module will only restart the container if no config changes are detected. Please note that several options have default values; if the container to be restarted uses different values for these options, it will be recreated instead. The options with default values which can cause this are auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty.
trans-unit.target: 当restart设置为 true 时，仅当未检测到配置更改时，模块才会重启容器。请注意，有几个选项具有默认值。如果要重新启动的容器对这些选项使用不同的值，则将重新创建它。可能导致此问题的默认值选项是auto_remove，detach，init，Interactive，memory，paused，privileged，read_only和tty。

trans-unit.source: When restart is set to true, the module will only restart the container if no config changes are detected. Please note that several options have default values; if the container to be restarted uses different values for these options, it will be recreated instead. The options with default values which can cause this are auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty. This behavior can be changed by setting container_default_behavior to no_defaults, which will be the default value from community.general 3.0.0 on.
trans-unit.target: When restart is set to true , the module will only restart the container if no config changes are detected. Please note that several options have default values; if the container to be restarted uses different values for these options, it will be recreated instead. The options with default values which can cause this are auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty. This behavior can be changed by setting container_default_behavior to no_defaults , which will be the default value from community.general 3.0.0 on.

trans-unit.source: When state is present specify whether or not to include linked services.
trans-unit.target: 当状态是 present 指定是否将包含链接的服务。

trans-unit.source: When state is present this is used to create the profile for username at a specific path within the profile directory.
trans-unit.target: 当状态是 present 这被用来创建用于配置文件的用户名在配置文件目录中的特定路径。

trans-unit.source: When state is absent and this option is true, any floating IP associated with the instance will be deleted along with the instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少状态且此选项为true，则与该实例关联的所有浮动IP都会与该实例一起删除。

trans-unit.source: When state is absent set this switch will use the -f parameter and delete the nic tag regardless of existing VMs.
trans-unit.target: 如果不设置状态，则此开关将使用 -f 参数并删除nic标签，而不管现有的VM如何。

trans-unit.source: When state is absent, indicates whether or not to delete the floating IP completely, or only detach it from the server. Default is to detach only.
trans-unit.target: 当状态不存在，指示是否彻底删除浮动IP，或者只能从服务器上拆除。默认为仅分离。

trans-unit.source: When state is present, and floating_ip_address is not present, this parameter can be used to specify whether we should try to reuse a floating IP address already allocated to the project.
trans-unit.target: 当状态存在，且floating_ip_address不存在，这个参数可以用来指定我们是否应该尝试重用已分配到项目的浮动IP地址。

trans-unit.source: When state is set to absent, will uninstall the specific version otherwise all versions of that package will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 当state设置为 absent 时，将卸载特定版本，否则将删除该软件包的所有版本。

trans-unit.source: When state is specified, the entity will be gathered from this parent, if it exists, unless an id is specified.
trans-unit.target: 当国家规定，则实体将从此父聚集，如果存在的话，除非ID指定的。

trans-unit.source: When state=="absent" the domain specified will be removed from the storage system.
trans-unit.target: When state=="absent" the domain specified will be removed from the storage system.

trans-unit.source: When state=="present" the defined LDAP domain will be added to the storage system.
trans-unit.target: When state=="present" the defined LDAP domain will be added to the storage system.

trans-unit.source: When state=="present" then criteria_drive_count or criteria_min_usable_capacity must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 当状态==“存在”然后criteria_drive_count或criteria_min_usable_capacity必须被指定。

trans-unit.source: When state=absent and certificate_arn is defined, this module will delete the ACM resource with that ARN if it exists in this region, and succeed without effect if it doesn’t exist.
trans-unit.target: When state=absent and certificate_arn is defined, this module will delete the ACM resource with that ARN if it exists in this region, and succeed without effect if it doesn’t exist.

trans-unit.source: When state=absent and certificate_arn is not defined, and domain_name is not defined, this module will delete all ACM resources in this AWS region with a corresponding Name tag. If there are none, it will succeed without effect.
trans-unit.target: When state=absent and certificate_arn is not defined, and domain_name is not defined, this module will delete all ACM resources in this AWS region with a corresponding Name tag. If there are none, it will succeed without effect.

trans-unit.source: When state=absent and domain_name is defined, this module will delete all ACM resources in this AWS region with a corresponding domain name. If there are none, it will succeed without effect.
trans-unit.target: When state=absent and domain_name is defined, this module will delete all ACM resources in this AWS region with a corresponding domain name. If there are none, it will succeed without effect.

trans-unit.source: When state=absent, instance_ids is required.
trans-unit.target: When state=absent, instance_ids is required.

trans-unit.source: When state=absent, remove the diversion of the specified path; when state=present, create the diversion if it does not exist, or update its package holder or divert location, if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: When state=absent, remove the diversion of the specified path; when state=present, create the diversion if it does not exist, or update its package holder or divert location, if it already exists.

trans-unit.source: When state=opened returns (generated or given) name of LUKS container. Returns None if no name is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 当state = opened时，返回（生成或给定的）LUKS容器的名称。如果未提供名称，则返回None。

trans-unit.source: When state=present updates existing hook or creates a new hook if not found.
trans-unit.target: When state=present updates existing hook or creates a new hook if not found.

trans-unit.source: When state=present, if there are multiple certificates in ACM with a Name tag equal to the name_tag parameter, this task will fail.
trans-unit.target: When state=present, if there are multiple certificates in ACM with a Name tag equal to the name_tag parameter, this task will fail.

trans-unit.source: When state=present, if there is one certificate in ACM a Name tag equal to the name_tag parameter, and a different body, this task will overwrite that certificate.
trans-unit.target: When state=present, if there is one certificate in ACM a Name tag equal to the name_tag parameter, and a different body, this task will overwrite that certificate.

trans-unit.source: When state=present, if there is one certificate in ACM with a Name tag equal to the name_tag parameter, and an identical body and chain, this task will succeed without effect.
trans-unit.target: When state=present, if there is one certificate in ACM with a Name tag equal to the name_tag parameter, and an identical body and chain, this task will succeed without effect.
